verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those חָלָ֥ה <WH2470> sick חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> was Hezekiah לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> unto death וַיָּב֣וֹא <WH935> came אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> and יְשַׁעְיָ֨הוּ <WH3470> And Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֜וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> the prophet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD צַ֣ו <WH6680> in order לְבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> Set thine house כִּ֛י <WH3588> for מֵ֥ת <WH4191> for thou shalt die אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not תִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> and not live

וַיַּסֵּ֧ב <WH5437> turned חִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH2396> Then Hezekiah פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face אֶל־ <WH413> to הַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> toward the wall וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> and prayed אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> And said אָנָּ֤ה <WH577> I beseech יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> now O LORD זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember נָ֞א <WH4994> now אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> how הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <WH1980> thee how I have walked לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before בֶּֽאֱמֶת֙ <WH571> thee in truth וּבְלֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <WH8003> and with a perfect וְהַטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> and have done וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> wept חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> And Hezekiah בְּכִ֥י <WH1058> wept גָדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> sore ס
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <WH3470> to Isaiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָל֞וֹךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> the God דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> תְּפִלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH8605> thy prayer רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> דִּמְעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH1832> thy tears הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold יוֹסִ֣ף <WH3254> behold I will add עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָמֶ֔יךָ <WH3117> unto thy days חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וּמִכַּ֤ף <WH3709> out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> of Assyria אַצִּ֣ילְךָ֔ <WH5337> And I will deliver וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> thee and this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> and I וְגַנּוֹתִ֖י <WH1598> and I will defend עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וְזֶה־ <WH2088> This לְּךָ֥ הָא֖וֹת <WH226> And this [shall be] a sign מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto thee from the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> will do יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> that he hath spoken

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold מֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> Behold I will bring again אֶת־ <WH853> צֵ֣ל <WH6738> the shadow הַֽמַּעֲל֡וֹת <WH4609> of the degrees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יָרְדָה֩ <WH3381> which is gone down בְמַעֲל֨וֹת <WH4609> dial אָחָ֥ז <WH271> of Ahaz בַּשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <WH8121> in the sun אֲחֹרַנִּ֖ית <WH322> backward עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten מַעֲל֑וֹת <WH4609> degrees וַתָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> returned הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> So the sun עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten מַעֲל֔וֹת <WH4609> degrees בַּֽמַּעֲל֖וֹת <WH4609> by which degrees אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יָרָֽדָה׃ <WH3381> it was gone down ס

מִכְתָּ֖ב <WH4385> The writing לְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah בַּחֲלֹת֕וֹ <WH2470> when he had been sick וַיְחִ֖י <WH2421> and was recovered מֵחָלְיֽוֹ׃ <WH2483> of his sickness

אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> I said בִּדְמִ֥י <WH1824> in the cutting off יָמַ֛י <WH3117> of my days אֵלֵ֖כָה <WH1980> enter בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> to the gates שְׁא֑וֹל <WH7585> of the grave פֻּקַּ֖דְתִּי <WH6485> I am deprived יֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> of the residue שְׁנוֹתָֽי׃ <WH8141> of my years

אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> I said לֹא־ <WH3808> no אֶרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> I shall not see יָ֔הּ <WH3050> the LORD יָ֖הּ <WH3050> [even] the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of the living לֹא־ <WH3808> no אַבִּ֥יט <WH5027> I shall behold אָדָ֛ם <WH120> man ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more עִם־ <WH5973> among י֥וֹשְׁבֵי <WH3427> no more with the inhabitants חָֽדֶל׃ <WH2309> of the world

דּוֹרִ֗י <WH1755> Mine age נִסַּ֧ע <WH5265> is departed וְנִגְלָ֛ה <WH1540> and is removed מִנִּ֖י <WH4480> at כְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> tent רֹעִ֑י <WH7473> from me as a shepherd's קִפַּ֨דְתִּי <WH7088> I have cut off כָאֹרֵ֤ג <WH707> like a weaver חַיַּי֙ <WH2416> my life מִדַּלָּ֣ה <WH1803> with pining sickness יְבַצְּעֵ֔נִי <WH1214> he will cut me off מִיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from day עַד־ <WH5704> until לַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> [even] to night תַּשְׁלִימֵֽנִי׃ <WH7999> wilt thou make an end

שִׁוִּ֤יתִי <WH7737> I reckoned עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> till morning כָּֽאֲרִ֔י <WH738> [that] as a lion כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that יְשַׁבֵּ֖ר <WH7665> so will he break כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַצְמוֹתָ֑י <WH6106> all my bones מִיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from day עַד־ <WH5704> until לַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> [even] to night תַּשְׁלִימֵֽנִי׃ <WH7999> wilt thou make an end

כְּס֤וּס <WH5483> Like a crane עָגוּר֙ <WH5693> [or] a swallow כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so אֲצַפְצֵ֔ף <WH6850> so did I chatter אֶהְגֶּ֖ה <WH1897> I did mourn כַּיּוֹנָ֑ה <WH3123> as a dove דַּלּ֤וּ <WH1809> fail עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> mine eyes לַמָּר֔וֹם <WH4791> [with looking] upward אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> the Lord עָֽשְׁקָה־ <WH6234> I am oppressed לִּ֥י עָרְבֵֽנִי׃ <WH6148> undertake

מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> What shall I say וְאָֽמַר־ <WH559> ? he hath both spoken לִ֖י וְה֣וּא <WH1931> Himself עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> unto me and himself hath done אֶדַּדֶּ֥ה <WH1718> [it] I shall go softly כָל־ <WH3605> all שְׁנוֹתַ֖י <WH8141> all my years עַל־ <WH5921> because מַ֥ר <WH4751> in the bitterness נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> of my soul

אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> O Lord עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> and יִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> by these [things men] live וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all בָּהֶן֙ חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> and in all these [things is] the life רוּחִ֔י <WH7307> of my spirit וְתַחֲלִימֵ֖נִי <WH2492> so wilt thou recover וְהַחֲיֵֽנִי׃ <WH2421> me and make me to live

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Lo לְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> Behold for peace מַר־ <WH4751> great לִ֣י מָ֑ר <WH4751> bitterness וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> who חָשַׁ֤קְתָּ <WH2836> but thou hast in love נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> to my soul מִשַּׁ֣חַת <WH7845> [delivered it] from the pit בְּלִ֔י <WH1097> of corruption כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִשְׁלַ֛כְתָּ <WH7993> for thou hast cast אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> behind גֵוְךָ֖ <WH1460> thy back כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֲטָאָֽי׃ <WH2399> all my sins

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot שְׁא֛וֹל <WH7585> For the grave תּוֹדֶ֖ךָּ <WH3034> cannot praise מָ֣וֶת <WH4194> thee death יְהַלְלֶ֑ךָּ <WH1984> can [not] celebrate לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יְשַׂבְּר֥וּ <WH7663> cannot hope יֽוֹרְדֵי־ <WH3381> thee they that go down ב֖וֹר <WH953> into the pit אֶל־ <WH413> for אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> for thy truth

חַ֥י <WH2416> The living חַ֛י <WH2416> the living ה֥וּא <WH1931> who יוֹדֶ֖ךָ <WH3034> he shall praise כָּמ֣וֹנִי <WH3644> do הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> thee as I [do] this day אָ֣ב <WH1> the father לְבָנִ֔ים <WH1121> to the children יוֹדִ֖יעַ <WH3045> shall make known אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> thy truth

יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD לְהוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <WH3467> [was ready] to save וּנְגִנוֹתַ֧י <WH5058> me therefore we will sing my songs נְנַגֵּ֛ן <WH5059> to the stringed instruments כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיֵּ֖ינוּ <WH2416> of our life עַל־ <WH5921> at בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> had said יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> For Isaiah יִשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> Let them take דְּבֶ֣לֶת <WH1690> a lump תְּאֵנִ֑ים <WH8384> of figs וְיִמְרְח֥וּ <WH4799> and lay [it] for a plaister עַֽל־ <WH5921> and הַשְּׁחִ֖ין <WH7822> upon the boil וְיֶֽחִי׃ <WH2421> and he shall recover

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> also had said חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah מָ֣ה <WH4100> What א֑וֹת <WH226> What [is] the sign כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <WH5927> that I shall go up בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah ס
